name: lod-mp3-mirror
description: Mirror of the audio data of the "LÃ«tzebuerger Online Dictionnaire" (LOD).

scripts.poststart: version="$(basename $(find . -type d -name '*-lod-opendata' -print -quit))" && git tag "$version" --force && git add -A && git commit -m "$version" && git push --tag --force
